summary: Documentary filmmaker Rupert Murray examines the devastating effect that overfishing has had on the world's fish populations and argues that drastic action must be taken to reverse these trends.
cast: Ben Bradshaw|Roberto Mielgo Bragazzi|Charles Clover|John Crosbie|Ted Danson|Haidar El Ali|Ray Hilborn|Jeffrey Hutchings|Mélanie Laurent|Manolo Pacheco Luis|Patricia Majluf|John T. Maxwell|Adama Mbergaul|Hardy Mckinney|Masanori Miyahara|Matthew Moir|Brian Mulroney|Richie Nota|Jamie Oliver|Stephen R. Palumbi|Daniel Pauly|Pete Petersen|Callum Roberts|Yvonne Sadovy|Ted Stevens|Rashid Sumaila|Serge Tudela|Boris Worm
title: The End of the Line
